Kirkland.Home of the Good Shepherd:
Meridian Playground (also known as Meridian Park) is in the Wallingford neighborhood of Seattle, Washington, United States.
The site features a building called the Good Shepherd Center, which is listed on the National Register of Historic Places as the Home of the Good Shepherd  and is a city of Seattle designated landmark. The center was built in 1906 as a Catholic School for wayward girls and operated until 1973.
